Stem: Triangular, smooth but increasingly rough towards top.
Leaves: Grass-like, glossy light green. V-shaped (in cross section) with finely serrated edges and a prominent mid-vein.
Flowers: A cluster of yellowish brown spikelets which are on 3-9 flower stems.
FruitSeeds: Yellowish brown seeds which are triangular.
DistinguishingFeatures: Very similar to Purple nutgrass (*Cyperus rotundus*) but has yellowish rather than purplish flowers.
